DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine feasibility video-assisted thoracoscopic wedge resection ( VAR ) follow radiotherapy patient stage I non-small cell lung cancer cardiopulmonary dysfunction . - Determine incidence locoregional recurrence patient treat regimen . - Determine overall disease-free survival patient treat regimen . - Determine technical feasibility ipsilateral lymph node sample complete resection VAR patient . - Determine incidence conversion open thoracotomy patient . - Determine short- long-term complication associate VAR patient . - Determine toxicity adjuvant radiotherapy VAR patient . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients undergo video-assisted thoracoscopic wedge resection . Surgeons attempt sample identification ipsilateral , mediastinal , hilar lymph node . When accessible , lobar lymph node must also sample . If tumor margin positive , resection margin must attempt . Open thoracotomy may require technical reason .
